overview: 1. LIVE AT THE METAL HAMMER FESTIVAL IN ST. GOARSHAUSEN, GERMANY - SEPTEMBER 14, 1985 2. LIVE AT MTV'S DAY ON THE GREEN AT OAKLAND STADIUM, OAKLAND, CA - AUGUST 31, 1985 3. title: Metallica: Ride The Lightning
